hero.subtitle: Research. Design. Innovate.
hero.title: ORINIUM — R&D Solutions for Future Robotics and Autonomous Systems

about.title: About ORINIUM
about.description1: ORINIUM is a student-led research and development startup focused on advancing robotics, artificial intelligence, and autonomous systems. Founded in 2022 at Yıldız Technical University, we combine academic excellence with practical innovation.
about.description2: Our mission is to develop cutting-edge solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in autonomous systems, from ground vehicles to intelligent control systems.

milestones.title: Our Journey
milestones.2024: Established industry partnerships and field testing

rd.title: R&D Areas
rd.subtitle: Pushing the boundaries of technology through focused research and development

robotics.title: Robotics
robotics.description: Design and development of autonomous ground vehicles, mobile robots, and mechanical systems for harsh environments and complex tasks.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Machine learning, computer vision, and intelligent control systems for autonomous decision-making and environmental perception.

embedded.title: Embedded Systems
embedded.description: Real-time control systems, sensor integration, and low-level programming for robotics applications and autonomous platforms.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Innovative solutions developed through rigorous research and testing

ares.description: A tracked unmanned ground vehicle designed for harsh terrain navigation, reconnaissance missions, and autonomous exploration in challenging environments.
ares.spec3: Real-time video streaming and sensor data

br01.description: A self-balancing two-wheeled robot demonstrating advanced control algorithms, real-time stabilization, and dynamic movement capabilities.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate researchers and engineers driving innovation

location.title: Our Location
location.address: Yıldız Teknopark, Davutpaşa Campus, Esenler, Istanbul, Turkey
